## Functions

### fixup() {#aeeddcc1e750e09610ab189e07a2d5bc8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void adjust::ldi::fixup (unsigned Size, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcfixup">MCFixup</a> &amp; Fixup, uint64&#95;t &amp; Value, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext">MCContext</a> &#42; Ctx)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Adjusts a value to fix up the immediate of an <code>LDI Rd, K</code> instruction.

Resolves to: 0000 KKKK 0000 KKKK Offset of 0 (so the result isn&#39;t left-shifted before application).

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/avr/lib/target/avr/mctargetdesc/avrasmbackend-cpp/#l00209">209</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/avr/lib/target/avr/mctargetdesc/avrasmbackend-cpp">AVRAsmBackend.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
